imdb.plot outline: We travel back in time to around 160 B.C. For centuries, belligerent nomads from the north had been raiding, looting and pillaging Chinese settlements. Emperor Wu of the Han dynasty decided to heed the advice of his generals and build a wall against the enemies. The Great Wall of China had begun.
imdb.title: Red Star Over China
plot: We travel back in time to around 160 B.C. For centuries, belligerent nomads from the north had been raiding, looting and pillaging Chinese settlements. Emperor Wu of the Han dynasty decided to heed the advice of his generals and build a wall against the enemies. The Great Wall of China had begun.
